name: Sibs Showdown
description:
Help JC navigate his way through the galaxy. Slay enemies while looking for a portal to the next world. Killing enemies grants points, and collecting stars does as well too. Each time you change worlds your inventory is reset. 

Press T to change weapons, space to jump, left click to shoot, shift to sprint!

If the game freezes due to "Playerloop Error" refresh the browser and re-try. This is a known issue to unity in which you can vote up and view here

Please let me know of any bugs or issues that you face and I will try and get them fixed asap!
